word: 19-21 (1 Peter 2:4, 5). Lusterless Stones Without Value.--When I meditate upon this fountain of living power from which we may freely draw, I mourn that so many are losing the delight they might have in considering His goodness. To be sons and daughters of God, growing into an holy temple to the Lord, "no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;" "built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone"-- this is our privilege.
